article: the white house on thursday made fun of former president bill clinton and his wife , sen. hillary rodham clinton , for criticizing president george w. bush 's decision to commute the prison sentence of a former aide in the cia leak case .
abstract: bush spokesman says clintons have nerve for criticizing bush on commuting former aide s prison term
